website_summaries.verdict: Superior UV and glare protection without the tell-tale yellow tint of other models.
pros: Redirects blue light away from eyes
Fashionable frames at a basic price point
Includes a protective case and cleaning cloth
cons: Smudges can be difficult to remove
Some users report additional eye strain
Exterior light can cause unwanted reflections

customer_reviews.title: It's worth your investment!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. Had to find a way to lessen my eye strain after taking note of how many hours I actually spend at a computer screen... and it was more than I expected. I started wearing these regularly and my headaches are significantly less frequent, my eye fatigue is almost gone, and I can go without worrying about damaging my ocular muscles. As a 1/2 blue blocker, it's not as yellow as some other computer glasses I've put on, but I much prefer these. Things that aren't actually white don't look yellow after you adjust to them. Plus... they're really cute. I actually found myself wanting to wear them more than I needed to at first.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: NOT as Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: These SUCK! - especially for the price. These are not what was advertised - NO COLOR DISTORTION - Unlike other glasses, Spectrum lenses don’t distort screen colors or have a harsh yellow tint. - THEY HAVE THE YELLOW TINT - and will not let me returned them. Buyer beware - don't make the mistake I did and DO NOT believe the description. Very disappointed in the misleading sales pitch on these. Even one star is too much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great customer support
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a quality product and I totally notice a difference when I forget to use them. However, my head (even for a female) is a bit on the narrow to small size so these looked a bit wide on me, and I could have used a bit more viewing room height wise too. If these came in just a half inch on the sides, and a half inch higher they would be perfect! Customer service for this brand was really responsive and super helpful in their suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Alyna Ohanian Huennekens

customer_reviews.title: Straining to Focus with These
customer_reviews.text: I work at a computer all day long M-F, and I got these to help alleviate my red tired eyes. They do block blue light, but there must be some kind of curvature to the lenses, because I feel like I have trouble focusing and it feels uncomfortable. I feel more strain to just see what I’m looking at. Every time I take them off I feel relief. I wish these worked for me - going to return. Back to searching...
customer_reviews.author: River North

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but not for me
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have several pros: lightweight, comfortable, good quality and came very nicely packaged with a strong protective travel case. I was looking forward to seeing if they help to reduce my headaches with full work days spent at a computer. Unfortunately the solid wide frame of the glasses is not for me. I only wear prescription glasses for distance and they have a very minimal frame, so the dark solid frames on these are annoying to my eyes. If you are accustomed to wearing glasses a lot and with dark frames then they likely won't bother you. They are pretty comfortable on.
customer_reviews.author: Aquarian4Life

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: Too Small, will not allow returns
customer_reviews.text: Very small glasses that do not fit comfortably, and returns are not accepted. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caution - No Returns
customer_reviews.text: I should have read through the reviews warning about no returns before buying these. I tried them for about 30 minutes, and they gave me a terrible headache. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: chris2016

customer_reviews.title: Best classy glasses for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use this glasses for working (at a computer) and play videogames (when wife allows me...) I'm 35 years old and I have been working on a computer since I was 18. Last couple months I noticed my eyesight would be tired by the time I get back to home, and even watching TV was getting blurry for me. I tried couple other options that are cheaper, but, this ones are higher quality built, they look better and they won't get fingerprints or dirtyness super easily. One thing you should be aware though is that plastic frame it breaks easily, but if you do know how to properly treat glasses you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Masaki

customer_reviews.title: Great if you look at screens all day
customer_reviews.text: regular fit was a little too big for my face, but the glasses were very lightweight. font on the computer screen was 100x clearer. Eyes felt less tired and strained. Less furrowing of brows to read on my laptop or phone. bought 3 pairs to have around the house, at the office and in my car since I don't like wearing glasses all day. I have a prescription reading glasses of +1.5, but even using a pair with no magnification helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: IKKL

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not colorless, pronounced yellow tint
customer_reviews.text: I got these for sim racing because I got a new 4k QLED tv a couple of months ago and it seemed my eye strain level was getting worse. I figured some sort of computer glasses should help. I got these because the description said the lenses were colorless. Well, they aren't colorless. There is a distinct yellow tint to them. What should be a bright red Ferrari looks like it's got a layer of dust on it. But I guess there's really no such thing as colorless computer glasses so it is what it is. These, along with some eye drops before racing, seem to help my eye strain problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jezza819

customer_reviews.title: No more computer headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot sing enough praises! I am between glasses, meaning my distance glasses no longer work at my computer, but I am not ready for bifocals, but I need(ed) something at my PC. Just for the heck of it I figured I'd I would try these "blue blocker" glasses... And oh my goodness!! No more headaches, no more eye strain, and I am no longer exhausted after work! I did not expect so much relief when I purchase these glasses. Totally worth their weight in gold!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work for long periods
customer_reviews.text: If you're using it for more than 2hrs it wont do much it helps but not as much. Eyes still get irritated. Its better for small time use like 1hr Overall it looks nice, but not worth the price since it doesnt really do its purpose *Picture was taken after an 1hr and 30mins of use* Its better to go with a different pair or brand one that offers 100% blocking of blue light
customer_reviews.author: Norberto Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great buy UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: Update* It has been nearly a full year since I bought these glasses, and I'm standing by my original review that these are hands down the best computer glasses you can buy. Mine had scratched on the lenses a little bit which can really annoy you and make it had to stay focused while working or gaming. Contacted customer service and within a day they are sending me a new pair, no hassle, no problems! Great company that actually stands by their word. Great buy, I am an advisor gamer and streamer and these glasses feel comfortable and help a lot with the lighting. My headaches went away since wearing them which was nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Stebbins

customer_reviews.title: Effective, lightweight, and attractive design
customer_reviews.text: I wear contacts and work on computers for a minimum of 10 hours per day. I noticed some eye strain and slight headaches. Researched several models and chose this one for the benefits stated and the look. They are lightweight and I wear them all day. My eyes are not as tired anymore. If you are on video conferencing, the glasses are very reflective and show viewers the blue light bounced back. For that reason, I do not wear them during video meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Loved these glasses and really good for covering those unwanted uv lights. I need to be in front of a computer 8-9 hours a day. Only problem I had which is why I had to return them was that the regular size were too big for my frame, long wise not width. Since I loved them so much I decided to order the smaller ones and see how those work out. Now I am 5’ and 113lbs, so you have an idea in why I may need a smaller frame. Other than that....FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.author: LISETT PASTRANA

customer_reviews.title: So glad I picked these up
customer_reviews.text: I spend all day on a computer, and about a year ago began to suffer from serious eye fatigue by the end of each day. At an eye exam my doctor assured me corrected vision was 20/20. My husband purchased special computer glasses, but I don't have a similar benefit with my vision insurance. I purchased these since the $40 price tag was more reasonable than spending $100 or more through my eye doctor. What a godsend they've been! The tint on the glasses is just enough to block out the blue light from the screen. I no longer suffer the burning and fatigue by the end of the day. So glad I picked these up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: A good substitute.
customer_reviews.text: Got these as my eyes started to tire after looking at a computer for 8 hrs a day from a previous long standing desk job (5 years). They helped out a bit in reducing glare and was a noticeable difference from my eyes being tired at the end of the day. However, due to my "vision" I had to switch between my prescription glasses & these when I had to read/respond to customer emails, and when talking to customers on the phone for troubleshooting. Nothing against the seller, but I wish I would have purchased the "adjusted" lenses to fit my poor vision XD
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rod

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: We got a Hi def TV and my eyes were suddenly hurting so bad, trying to watch anything. I used an old pair of prescription glasses and that helped but then my dogs chewed them up. I got this pair to see and what a lifesaver. No more headaches or sore eyes. I grab these the moment I am about to sit down and watch TV. They are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, light, reasonably built and do their job well
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and she really likes them so far. She has to stare at the monitor almost 10 hours in a day due to which she used to get headaches. With these glasses, she's feeling much better and her headaches have almost gone. The only thing I miss in these glasses is the snap close feature where the arms are spring loaded and snap shut when you fold the arms.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousPortland

customer_reviews.title: Effective attractive &  affordable
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different computer glasses recently and these are the most effective thus far. The lightweight, blue light blockers fits my face perfectly and looks very professional in my workplace environment. While these have helped, I just wished I had found them sooner as my eyes are super dry and super sensitive to light so I’m still seeking eye care after I work the night shift
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Love that they’re very durable & flexible
customer_reviews.text: I was getting headaches whenever I was on my phone or computer for long periods of time. I was able to turn the blue light off & the “night shift” on on my phone but my computer didn’t have that option so I purchased these. So far I haven’t gotten any headaches since using them! Love that they’re very durable & flexible. Also love the little case that they come in. Only con for me is that the frame isn’t very flattering on my face, wish there were different options.
customer_reviews.author: Greyandpeach

customer_reviews.title: 1) Lens were scratched when i received the item. ...
customer_reviews.text: 1) Lens were scratched when i received the item. I was very excited when i received those glasses but when I opened up the case I found that they were scratched. 2) Doesn’t help your eyes when you work with a computer. No difference either you wear the glasses or not your eyes became to tired when you work for a while with pc. I used the app Flux and it really helped, but unfortunately those glasses doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Yurii

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Significantly reduces eye strain! These glasses have alleviated so much discomfort. I have a sensitivity to lights and I'm often squinting and have a headache after prolonged use of computers. At work I have 6 computer screens in front of me, and by the end of an eight hour shift I have sore, blurry, dry eyes. I immediately noticed a difference with these glasses. No headaches and eye strain is completely gone! Additionally, I use them when driving at night to reduce the brightness of headlights. The frames are lightweight with a very slight yellow tint to the lens. They came in a nice matte black magnetic close case, with a microfiber cloth inside.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I work in an office and spend 6-7 hours in front of a computer screen. My first day wearing these, I noticed two things. First, whenever I removed the glasses and looked at the computer, I had to squint my eyes. I never realized how harsh the computer light was. These glasses made a huge difference. Second, at the end of the day, my eyes were much less tired. While I do not consciously notice it, it feels like my eyes are much more relaxed throughout the day. Style-wise, they aren't bad. I don't love thick-framed glasses, but these have a modern look to them. I would definitely recommend purchasing these if you work with a computer
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of computer glasses for a while but they had tinted yellow lenses that kind of distorted colors. I liked the look of these because they weren't tinted. It turns out there is a very subtle tint, but it's definitely not as noticeable as in my other pair. This pair is very lightweight and comfortable and they don't leave marks on my face like my old ones. I haven't gotten any headaches since I've been using them and have definitely noticed a difference in eye strain (or lack thereof).
customer_reviews.author: EJF

customer_reviews.title: They definitely work!
customer_reviews.text: I work in front of 10 screens almost every day for 10-12 hours. My eyes can barely function unless the (florescent) lights in the room are completely off and night mode is active on all of my programs. That poses a problem for my coworkers who don't want the lights off. These glasses are amazing! I worked a whole 10 hour shift with the lights on and my eyes aren't fatigued or dry at all. Plus, they look pretty darn snazzy.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz Southern

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these glasses. They are very lightweight, they look good and they block out a lot of blue lines. To the point that it makes it easier to drive because it reduces glare. I may have to invest in a different pair also because I heard these make me look like an old librarian woman.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Harakat

customer_reviews.title: Makes night driving easier
customer_reviews.text: I've always had vision issues seeing at night even though I've always had what is considered 20/20 vision during eye exams. Heard reviews that glasses that filter "blue light" and reduces glare and I have certainly noticed a difference. Glasses seem to give me a brighter and clearer view when driving at night, though it does come with a bit of a yellow hue. My daughter tells me the lenses give off a purple/blue reflection when she looks at me while I'm wearing them. Overall I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dabney

customer_reviews.title: thank you anyway
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute glasses. I checked out Spektrum's website and feel they're a trustworthy company. So I would've kept mine, but unfortunately they didn't work out for me - the more I used them, the worse my headaches grew, and the more tired my eyes got. It may be that I actually need a prescription. Once I confirm that with a vision exam, I might look into another pair, because I really like the idea of protecting my eyes from screen glare. I just need to get it done right...
customer_reviews.author: L Shay

customer_reviews.title: Helps my eyes
customer_reviews.text: These work great. Full disclosure-i went from a very high stress and high blood pressure lifestyle where my head and eyes were constantly hurting to a much more relaxing lifestyle. I'm not sure if it's the placebo effect or not, but I still wear these glasses 85% of the time when looking at various screens. If I forget them, getting through a full work day is tough. I have not been to the eye doctor in a while but last time I went I has 20/20 and 20/15 vision. I'd recommend these for people that can't stand the harshness of all the screens we use nowadays. As always you should consult an eye doctor.
customer_reviews.author: J_TXN

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for blue-light blocking glasses and these had the highest rating. I have been using them every morning and every evening if/when I'm on the computer. I get my eyes rechecked in a few weeks and will know if there has been any appreciable change at that time. They are comfortable, do not 'shade' the world and most time (I wear prescription glasses anyway), I forget I'm wearing them. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kristyg

customer_reviews.title: Solid Pair of Blue Light Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I work daily in front of a monitor for over 8 hours as a solutions engineer while constantly demonstrating software. When I go home I often spend my time in the gym or often in front of more screens watching Netflix or gaming. I have noticed a significant improvement in my eyesight in the amount of time I have to resort to squinting late at night after wearing these glasses. I do not currently have any eyesight problem in my 20's and I hope to lessen any impact possible. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: fusionpoo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them; I feel so much better!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO glad I bought these! They were recommended by a coworker after telling her how my eyes and head hurt at the end of the day. I chose these particular pair/brand for how they look. My eyes are not tired and droopy at then end of my work day, I feel more clear and focused and my head doesn't hurt nearly as bad as it did! I always blamed my allergies (ha!) but after two days of using these glasses I have noticed SUCH a difference in how I feel! I will be ordering another pair soon! Delivered quickly and came in a very nice, heavy duty case with a cleaning cloth. ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristie Rennie

customer_reviews.title: I'd get pretty bad headaches by the end of the night before ...
customer_reviews.text: I've stopped getting headaches at work and they do really cut down on the brightness/glare. I work night shift at the hospital and frequently go from dark rooms to brightly lit computer screens. I'd get pretty bad headaches by the end of the night before these. They're also so subtle in their yellow tint that most people assume they're real glasses.
customer_reviews.author: KrysTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Post-Cataract Surgery
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to purchase a second pair. These are very effective at computer screen fatigue management. Makes everything easy on the eyes and corrects too-cool white balance. If you have recently had cataract surgery, consider these. After wearing these glasses for a few hours at the computer, it was the first time in two weeks that I didn't have a need for eye drops.
customer_reviews.author: Delinquent

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: If I use these I can work on my computers for much longer than without them. I wear them while watching television, as well. And perhaps my biggest like is my off-label use of them for night driving. The 50% blue light blocking is perfect for helping with the ridiculous lights on many new vehicles WITHOUT any significant darkening of everything else. All my senior age friends who tried mine bought their own!
customer_reviews.author: Neil B

customer_reviews.title: Great lenses, fragile frame
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, the filter works. I believe in the few days of using them that it has beneficial for my eyes. The complaint is the quality of the frames. Those free sunglasses you get as promotions have more durable frames. I'll try them a little longer but the price hasn't been worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: As advertised they help with eye fatigue but they also ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised they help with eye fatigue but they also produce an odd halo effect because of light reflecting off of the back of the lens. The glasses are very light but also flimsy. These are advertised as premium quality but look and feel of the frames does not reflect that. Overall they are acceptable but are being marketed as higher quality than they really are. The most premium thing about these is the packaging and carrying case. Some of that money should have been used towards a stouter pair of glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Chewy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: These have helped me a ton! I'm a full time college student always using a computer at school, I work part-time inputting data into a computer and all of my homework is done on my laptop so I am in front a computer screen from the AM 'til late at night most days. I have definitely felt the relief on my eyes. I have dry eyes and use drops but these glasses have helped a lot with the strain. I let my dad use them the other day and he said he felt the difference even with just one use! And the best part, they are quite affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Best evening glasses
customer_reviews.text: Definitely wear these glasses after dinner when I work on my computer or iPad to eliminate blue light affects. Prior to buying these glasses, I had a hard time falling asleep and felt like I was working 24/7! Amazingly, I can sleep 7-9 hours. The glasses are light weight and I wear them over my frameless reading glasses. No problems at all! I now wear them at night when I ride in my husband's corvette to also eliminate affects from cars with LED lights that are typically at the height corvette seats.
customer_reviews.author: Mithue

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR EYEBALLS
customer_reviews.text: ✨Been using my pair since the very beginning of the year and it's been a godsend to my eyeballs. They're really not tired or strained anymore, my eye bags have gone, I don't look to sunlight and hiss like one of dracula's brides in the night... these do exactly what you want them to do: save your eyeballs. These are super comfy and light on the face, look good and professional, and save your eyeballs. The only cons are the tint, which isn't has heavy as others so it's not bad at all really; and the fact that I prefer a free face but again these are super lightweight, so they're really not a bother.💖
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: I feel I wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in these. I chose them over far less expensive ones because I thought they would be better. They are so flimsy, they feel like reading glasses from the dollar store. I dont know if they work well, better than, or the same as cheaper ones, since it is my first pair. Im sorry I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought them a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for computer work and I started using them while using my smartphone. They seem to work. They do have that amber yellow tint but I read that there has to be some tinting to reduce blue light glare. They are lightweight due to the plastic frame and lens. They seem to be durable. They also seem to help with indoor office type lighting that can add to eye fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: MayB2day

customer_reviews.title: Out of the four sets of glasses I tried, this was by far the best. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying 4 types of of computer anti-glare glasses. All of the others had flimsy frames.and smudged easily. I ended up cleaning all three at a time to save time. Each pair lasted a day or maybe two. This pair is by far the more sturdy and smudges about the same as an ordinary pair of glasses. They can go many days without cleaning if you don't get finger prints on them. I highly recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the  money helps with lasik
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and soooo worth the money. I just got lasik surgery and I can tell you these amazing glasses help with eye strain as I’m getting over the dryness. I bought these regular ones and also ones with magnification. They are incredible you will be so happy with them. I also notice the helped with the flouresent lights as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mraven

customer_reviews.title: Great for headaches and a good night's sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but these glasses are great! I recently started working at a shop that has a lot of harshly lit displays and it's really been hurting my head by the end of the day. I've been wearing these glasses for almost a week now and my daily headaches are greatly diminished. I've also been sleeping much better and waking up much easier and earlier (I usually hate mornings!). My only reservation is that the frames are a bit flimsy... They're very comfy and cute though! I would definitely recommend these to a friend :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good but does have yellow tint
customer_reviews.text: The eyeglasses are nice and look and feel quality made. Even the boxing and glasses case is well made. They look stylish and feel good wearing them. But they DO have a yellow tint to them. I was a little disappointed in that because it said there wasn't yellow tint and there's is.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Uneven glasses. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are lightweight but feel very cheap. They came and are uneven. I owned another pair that cost 1/4 of the price and they were not very good. All the same problems I have with these. I thought, if I spent more, I would get better quality. I am very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a relief it is to have these!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic!! At work, I stare at a computer screen all day. For the past year or so I've been getting migraines regularly. I started looking into computer glasses and bought these. The number of migraines I've gotten since, along with the severity of the pain of the ones I do get, has gone down significantly! Unfortunately for me, migraines are caused by other things as well, but since I've gotten these glasses, thankfully the computer screen is no longer causing them!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Use them every day
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have made an incredible difference in my being able to work at the computer all day long. I even wear them at night when I'm playing on my ipad. Despite having the blue light turned down on my screen already, I was still having problems. After a week of wearing these those problems went away. Now I won't look at a screen unless I'm wearing them and am ordering a second pair for convenience. They also look really cute!
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Love these computer glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these glasses from the moment I put them on. First off, they are extremely comfortable to wear and look great on. And second, they are doing exactly as described and my eyes feel so much better. I spend at least nine hours a day looking at a computer screen and lately my eyes have felt so strained by the end of the day. I just had an eye exam and my vision is still 20/20 so I did not need prescription glasses. Just something to help reduce the eye strain and fatigue. These did the trick! Even thinking about buying a second pair...one for work and one for home. Thanks Spektrum!
customer_reviews.author: Julie K.

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars only for neat packaging and case
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hoping to help with my eye strain and migraines. They only lasted an hour on my eyes before I felt worse than before. Every light reflected off of them into my eyes and made them hurt more than before. The style was also somewhat wide. They did not fall off but felt very loose. Came in a nice magnetic case with a cleaning towel but other than that these were awful. Included picture showing how bad the reflection was while wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: LsMaMA2012

customer_reviews.title: must have if you are spending time in front of a monitor
customer_reviews.text: what an essential gear to have . my eyes use to burn and get tired after playing PC games or just reading articles or my books from the play store. the eyes just were tired, I was using a little PC application can f.lux , to lower the blue light from the monitor, until one day I saw these glasses in a YouTube tech channel caller NZXT tech tips, since I've got them, I can get so much done now, after a two hour PC gaming session or reading a book for an hour, or even watching a movie my eyes feel as fresh a watermelon . very happy with these ,
customer_reviews.author: michel angelo lopez

customer_reviews.title: Headaches are gone... unbelievable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started getting severe headaches after having to stare at my monitor for hours per day to the point that it affected the quality of my life. I found this on amazon and decided to buy it based off the reviews. Boy, the headache has never come back!!!!!!! I’m literally still counting days from my previous headache (that I got right before using these) and I’m so blown away.... don’t think twice if you get headaches over computer screen, get these! You will be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: No more headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a desk with a computer all day and tend to read on my phone at night. By the end of the day my eyes were hurting and I would have a headache most days. After the first week of wearing these I realized that I had not had a headache since I started wearing them and my eyes were no longer as tired or sore. I definitely recommend some kind of blue light blocking glasses for people who work on a computer all day. I got the regular size and I wish I had gotten the small size because they are a little big for me. But that is my fault!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, light weight, and does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several blue light glasses to test out. These are definitely the best! They look and feel super comfortable. And they do the job better than all the others online. I would highlight recommend. Fyi they seemed a bit big on me, but still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jila Malek

customer_reviews.title: No more headaches
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I decided to take a chance and get these computer glasses. I was getting daily headaches, dry eyes and eye fatigue. I noticed a huge difference within 30 minutes and I’m a believer. I’ve worn these all last week and zero headaches. I’m not using visine every hour and my eyes feel great after 9 hours of staring at a monitor. I highly recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Tania A.

customer_reviews.title: Improve eye quality after looking at screens all way
customer_reviews.text: My eyes would be so dry by the end of the day from staring at a computer/phone all day. I was skeptical and bought these and they truly did make a difference. I no longer get that dry eye feeling at the end of the day. Lenses do have a little bit of a yellow tint to them but you get used to it. Overall comfy on the face.
customer_reviews.author: kyle f.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are worth every dime. I have 9 migraines a month. I stare at a screen for work all day. These have greatly reduced the strain on my eyes since I bought them. Even better, they don’t look overly yellow to other people when you’re wearing them. Sometimes I forget they are on when I walk away from my computer, they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BrianH

customer_reviews.title: These glasses have reduced my migraines
customer_reviews.text: In the 6 months between starting a job where I stare at a screen all day and buying these glasses, I was experiencing eyestrain and headaches at least once a week, and full-blown, debilitating migraines at least twice per month. Since getting these, I have had 3 or 4 migraines all year, and most of those were probably hormonally triggered. They do smudge easy. You have to clean them nearly every time you wear them. But they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great computer glasses and more
customer_reviews.text: I would not be without these computer glasses. I wear them all the time and hardly know I have them on. They are smaller than most and are very attractive but still do the job. The lens color is slight but effective. I get compliments on them. I am extremely light sensitive and they are perfect for shopping in supermarkets and malls. I can wear them on rainy days and still see. Late at night they are still wearing well when I watch TV, read and complete my last email check. You will not be sorry if you purchase. These are my favorite!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Put them on and felt immediate relief
customer_reviews.text: I needed something in the day as my bright screen can be problematic when I'm working with word documents because of the pure white background. These alleviated the problem. They were comfortable enough that I forgot about them being on my face after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jah-kwann Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great for tired, computer eyes - reviews saying that they are difficult to clean are true!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have been a lifesaver for me. I stare at a computer screen all day, and they definitely help ease eye strain, and my eyes don't feel dried out/tired when I get home from work. When I bought these glasses, I'd seen some reviews saying that these glasses are difficult to clean, and I thought that was a really silly thing to say and couldn't be true. Well, unfortunately, it is! Once a smudge gets on these glasses, they are very difficult to clean for some reason. I've had mine for almost 3 years now, so I feel like I've gotten my money's worth. But, wanted to warn people that these will be somewhat of a pain to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Anna F.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! Have been wearing at work with computers and fluorescent lights and I can feel a big difference. Less dryness and tired eyes for sure. Also, I don't feel the tension headaches hardly at all. I love these and have been recommending these to anybody who will listen. The frames look good on everybody too. I have the hardest time finding frames and these I love!! Buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: Teripsu94

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: They work! I sit at a desk for nine plus hours daily for work and school. I am a full time student as well as a full time employee! Needless to say, I need some help avoiding headaches, eye fatigue and other stresses on my eyes. These are far more stylish than my previous pair form a different company. These are also made extremely well for the price. The packaging is great and sturdy! Its easy to take these to and from the office and I often forget I have them on! Do yourself a favor, get a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney DesForge

customer_reviews.title: The Prospek glasses seem to work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife one week ago. She had been complaining of eye fatigue and headaches associated with being on the computer all day for work. She felt improvement with those symptoms from day one of using the glasses. After a week she continues to feel much better and attributes that improvement to the glasses. She also states that the glasses are lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: gregory m white

customer_reviews.title: My eyes are happy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love my spectrum glasses. I purchased 5 pairs for every member of my family. The last few years my eye sight has gotten worse. Worse because I'm in front of a computer all day, stare at my iPhone all day, reading Facebook, emails, etc. and then go home to my LED Televsion and then read my kindle in bed! Almighty God, no wonder, my eyes are bad. The spectrum glasses are confortable and my eyes aren't tired anymore. Hopefully I will have better eye sight Years from now. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3!
customer_reviews.text: One to leave at work, one by my laptop and one by my desktop at home. Instant soothing to the eyes. I had no idea how badly I was straining my eyes. I'm on the computer all day and the blue light was killing me I had no idea until I put the glasses on. I'll check in again if anything changes. Initial impression is good. I can't tell you about the long term affects just yet.
customer_reviews.author: dawnkeys

customer_reviews.title: Amazing difference!
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a difference in the first week: less eye strain, less tension, and less fatigue! Something so simple has made such a difference. I spend 8 hours a day in front of a screen and never realized how much a difference blocking the blue light would make. They are a bit flimsy in the ear pieces, but if taken care of they don't seem to have any issues. I return them to the case as soon as I take them off and haven't had any issues with cracking or bending.
customer_reviews.author: SRW

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: Like many other people, I spend a lot of time in front of a digital screen. I bought these glasses in order to help with eye strain and protect my eyes from blue light. However, after wearing these costly $40 glasses for 2 months now, I have felt no difference. If anything, my eyes feel worse after wearing the glasses. This product is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: givenchy

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable Difference
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these glasses after noticing usually tired eyes after working all day and a friend mentioned getting a pair of glasses to help with looking at a computer screen all day. So, I went to Amazon and did a little research and ultimately decided on this PROSPEK pair. After the first week I noticed a difference in how much less tired my eyes were at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lunsford

customer_reviews.title: They really do work!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! They really do help with eye strain; since I started using them, my eyes feel less dry and tired at the end of the day. And they are cute, comfortable, and lightweight. The lenses are more or less clear, and I can barely notice a difference in the colors on my computer screen (which, as a graphic designer, is important). The price is great, too, especially compared to similar products. Very glad I found these!
customer_reviews.author: krysten220

customer_reviews.title: Eases Eye Fatigue and computer glare or fluorescent headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a space with no natural light, fluorescent ceiling panels and have a 27" LED display monitor. These glasses have made a HUGE difference in the eye fatigue and headachy feeling I usually have at the end of each day. I highly recommended you try them if you experience eye strain or headaches in artificial light or when using LED devices - computers, laptops, etc. They are super lightweight and look just like contemporary reading glasses. (and I'm picky about looks!)
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking AND they work!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these glasses!! I've only had them a week, but I have noticed a significant decrease in my headaches. I work for the Florida Legislature and I own my own photography business, so I am on the computer A LOT! When looking at the glasses you don't notice the yellow tint, which I like. Also, I really love the frame shape and the splash of red. They are very trendy and look good (not huge on my face). They are very lightweight and came with a great case to store them in. So far I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: work great for me
customer_reviews.text: I was experiencing headaches and eye ache during the increased online work I need to do due to the pandemic of 2020, and these have made it possible to do the work without pain or discomfort. They fit really well too and people have complimented them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey Becker

customer_reviews.title: Best glasses I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I only write reviews when a product really does exceed expectations. I've tried many brands of computer glasses, ranging from Gunnar to J+S (both casual edition and "gaming" edition). And at some point one of these products would always show some fault. Headaches , scratches , or just breaking. Well, I've been using this product for almost a week, and it blew my mind , I literally can stare at a computer screen for HOURS on end without feeling anything , it's like my eyes don't even detect any sort of blue light, it's amazing. Really recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shlomi

customer_reviews.title: Blue Light Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure out what was causing my eye irritation until I started reading about blue light emitted by computer monitors. I decided to try the Prospek glasses and I'm glad I did. After receiving the glasses, I was quite surprised to find that my eyes are no longer irritated when I'm using them. As an experiment, I tried looking a the monitor without the glasses and I once again experienced irritation so now I plan to use them every time. They are light weight and comfortable, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Trend

customer_reviews.title: Helps pressure!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for a week and although I don't suffer from headaches I do have pressure in my eyes and when I put these on they are instantly relieved. But warning, they look like reading glasses. I was hoping they would be larger so I dont feel like they are that attractive on my face personally. But if that is not a concern of yours, the filter does help and I have 5 monitors at work.
customer_reviews.author: JasB

customer_reviews.title: They do what they say they'll do
customer_reviews.text: The shipper sent them in a case, with a cleaning towel so there was no chance of them arriving broken. They're light weight, comfortable glasses that immediately made an impact on my eyes. Before getting these I would have itchy/burning/watery eyes from looking at my laptop/cell phone/tv all day, which would in turn cause headaches and squinting. These glasses have alleviated all of that, soooooo happy!
customer_reviews.author: kscogg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Best purchase I've made in a while.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I've been having headaches every day for the past 10 days. I suspected it could be because of a blue light sensitivity as I have been working more intense hours the past 10 days with constant activity on the phone, tablet, computer, and tv. My new office also has intense fluorescent lights so I suspected they were part of the cause. I have been wearing these for a straight 24 hours.... I don't take them off and I'm happy to say for the first time in over a week I made it through the entire day yesterday without having to pop some advil. They are the lightest and most comfortable glasses I've ever worn, and look pretty stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: No more headaches!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are amazing! My headaches are gone, my tired eyes are gone, and I don’t seem to be as drained at the end of a long workday. You have made this teacher extremely happy! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses, receive lots of compliments, only complaint is I did not receive a cleaning cloth and smudges are impossible to remove without one. I work under BRIGHT/blinding L.E.D. Lights all day and have permanent U.V. damage in my eyes. These not only give me the protection I was looking for but my eyes can relax and being at work is no longer painful (it used to feel like my eyes were bleeding)
customer_reviews.author: Lara Page

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight and protects your eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have had these glasses for two days and I can already tell a difference. I sit in front of a computer all day (I'm a business writer) and my eyes are frequently dry, scratchy, and tired. These help A LOT. They are light weight and comfortable. They took an hour or two to get used to but now everyone in my office wants a pair!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: 6 month usage review
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review after 6 months as I wanted to ensure that what I post is true. I love every thing about it. Its light weight, anti glare, customer service. Everything!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Blocks the blue light and less headaches!
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses and does its job. I like the design more than the other ones out there, and it was delivered quickly. I have less frequent headaches and eye aches now, after looking at the computer screen all day. Sometimes feels heavy on my nose bridge after wearing several hours straight but that may be just me. Overall, very happy with this purchase! Wish I got them ages ago!
customer_reviews.author: Millie Chu

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Love the shape and the color red on ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Love the shape and the color red on the inside. The lenses are not as yellow as some glasses I have seen but it still has a little tint to it. I have only used them for one day but I feel like my eyes don't get as tired from staring at the screen all day. The case is a hard case and the cleaning cloth is much better quality then all the ones I have had in the past. I am very happy with my purchase and about to order another pair for my husband. Thank you Spectrum
customer_reviews.author: Celine B

customer_reviews.title: and once again a happy writer!
customer_reviews.text: As an author and writing coach I spend a lot of time starring into my computer screen. I was experiencing eye strain and dry eyes that made my work difficult. Using the Spektrum Glasses has had a positive, noticeable effect, benefiting not only my eyes but my ability to stay focused and work longer. Additionally, as I age, my eyes are becoming dryer, further mitigated by my daily computer use. The glasses have helped tremendously ... less headaches, less eye strain, less dry-eyed, and once again a happy writer!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Conradi

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I still don't know how important these glasses are, but I got them for work and when I don't put them on I notice my eyes strain a little as soon as I look at the screen, which prompts me to use them. It does seem to help a good deal. I am considering another pair for home. The light frames are comfortable to wear too, and I am sensitive to pressure and prone to headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna L C B B

customer_reviews.title: Teenager appreciates something that wasn't his idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage son who spends a lot of time on the computer and other screens. He had developed dark circles under his eyes that I attributed to eye strain. Now, I don't really know that blue light was the cause, but I do know that since he has begun using these, the dark circles have faded. He's never had to wear glasses for visual acuity, but he wears these all the time when he uses the computer at home. I was afraid I'd have to make him wear them since they weren't his idea, but no, I think he has really noticed a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Very Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blue ray blocking glasses! I have tried several. All of the cheap ones made glare, and some tend to slip down on my nose. This one is more expensive but way better than the cheap ones. It’s more comfortable, light-weighted and no headache for sitting at the computer for a long time!! I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Goldhue

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: Immediate relief! I have two large monitors I stare at all day and by three pm, my eyes are tired and sore (?) and itchy. I have thought for years that I had eye allergies but all the drops and allergy medicines in the world have not alleviated the symptoms. I literally have been wearing these glasses for 10 minutes and had to write a review because as soon as I put them on, my eyes were like..."thank you!!"
customer_reviews.author: becklykay

customer_reviews.title: A plus in benefits!
customer_reviews.text: Really helps my dry eye.I have worn the glasses all day and again at night. Usually my eyes get very dry after looking at a screen all day. I actually only bought these glasses because I heard they would help with blue light from the screen. I did not expect the added benefit of helping with dry eye. The glasses are well worth the money. I also thought that when worn, that everything in my view would be yellow. Not the case at all. So glad I did my eyes a favor and purchased these glasses .
customer_reviews.author: Jmcm

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these glasses. Brought it to a glasses shop and had them do a blue light test. It blocks about 50%. I ended up getting the lenses replaced with 98% blue light blocking lenses but I opted to use this frame because it looks and feels great (very lightweight). The lens cleaner that this came with was garbage though. All it did was smudge and move grime all over the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are stylish and well-designed. They are so lightweight. Cost is a little more pricey but worth it. It does what it says. After using them, I don't get eye strain after long hours of computer use. The only reason I give it a 4-star is because it did not come with the special wipe cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Headache reducers!!
customer_reviews.text: So for great!! I've only had them for 3 days and today is the first day having them at work, where I got them for. I sit in front of a computer for 12hrs a day sometimes and usually end up with a headache so I thought I would try them out. Was sitting at my computer without them on this morning and I noticed my eyes were really hurting. I remembered I had my glasses and within 10 minutes of putting them on, my eyes didn't hurt anymore! So for me...TOTALLY worth it! I love them and plan on getting my husband a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Rachell B.

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little big
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the quality of these glasses and i can see the difference in how the blue light is reduced. I do feel they are a little to big/wide for my face, but i'll try them and see how they work out. Also, i love how light they are.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking blue tint glasses
customer_reviews.text: My husband is always on the computer and loves them glasses. I can even wear them and got a lot of compliments on the red color. Blue tint filter is more visible on these glasses but my husband really liked it cause he can see the changes color when using it. It also comes a very sturdy case.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Excelent presentation... but just plastic quality
customer_reviews.text: I have to say the presentation of these glasses is excelent, looks like a pro glasses when you receive the package and case... but, the glasses it self, they are just a regular plastic glasses, i think i could had have similar for less money. And about the purpose of these product, I'm not really sure, I have not felt as significant changes as others express, neither in my eyes nor in improving sleep patterns, Over all, decent quality and a pro presentation
customer_reviews.author: foxjmr07

customer_reviews.title: Very effective. Keep in mind the shape of the glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Here is a comparison with classic style glasses. The 'regular' style PROSPEK glasses (on the right) have a 'field of view' smaller compared with classic style glasses. So you will have to hold your phone higher to keep it in the field of view. But as promised, these glasses are very effective against eye strain from TV and computer screen.
customer_reviews.author: ATUL

customer_reviews.title: Glasses work
customer_reviews.text: When I first put on the glasses, I noticed light was more greenish or yellowish. which means LESS blue light was reaching my eyes. When I tried using in front of computer screen, I did not notice much difference, but after about 1/2 hour I did notice my eyes did not ache as they normally did. In other words. THEY WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PROSPEK Blue Light Blocking Glasses Pro
product_meta.description:

feature_bullets: TR90 Extremely durable and comfortable polycarbonate frame
Polycarbonate with 7 layers of blue light protection lens

DON'T CHEAP OUT not all blue light blocking glasses are made the same our anti bluelight glasses may not be the cheapest because they are the best. Prospek anti blue light glasses are third party tested and will provide immediate and lasting relief.

LOOKS GREAT ON EVERYONE With our blue light blocking glasses both women and men look great in our glasses! Our unisex style means that our blue-light glasses will look great on your face and you will be fending off compliments.

NO HARSH YELLOW TINT computer glasses for blue light blocking often have either a dark orange tint or are poor quality. Our patent lens process means our computer glasses blue light blocking we can get more protection with less tint.
REDUCE EYE STRAIN Prospek computer glasses help women and men relieve migraines, eye strain and dry eyes associate with too much blue light.
LIFETIME WARRANTY - Manufacturer lifetime warranty means you have nothing to lose. We stand behind our products because they will last a lifetime. COMES WITH GIFT BOX
